title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/eliza_dane_okafor.html
notes:
humbly apply to this bank today, SEPTEMBER -------------, as next of kin to
your customer MR.PETER BASIL ANDERSON

of the said above money deposited with your bank, and I wish my application

transferred to my account in my country.

messages.body:
10 September 2006

Barrister John Okafor (SAN),
Okafor & ASSOCIATES

Telephone/ 234-80-330-12795

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am Barrister John Okafor , a solicitor atlaw,personal attorney to Mr.P.B
Anderson, a national Of your country,who used to work with Shell Development
Company in nigeria. Here in after shall be referred to as my client. On the
21st of April 2001, my client,his wife and their only daughter were involved in
a car accident along Nouvissi express Road. Alloccupants of the vehicle
unfortunately lost there lives. Since then I have made several enquiries to
your embassy here to locate any of my clients extended relatives, this has also
proved unsuccessful.

After these several unsuccessful attempts,I
decided to track his last name over the Internet, to locate any member of his
family hence I contacted you.I have contacted you to assist in repartrating the
fund valued at US$10.5 million left behind by my client before it gets
confisicated or declared unserviceable by the Security Finance Firm where this
huge amount were deposited. The said Security Finance Company has issued me a notice
to provide the next of kin or have his account confisicated within the next
twenty one official working days.

Since I have been unsuccesfull in locating
therelatives for over 2years now, I seek the consent

to present you as the next of kin to the
deceased since you have the same last names, so that the proceeds of this
account can be paid to you.Therefore, on receipt of your positive response, we
shall then discuss the sharing ratio and modalities for transfer.I have all
necessary information and legal documents needed to back you up for claim.

All I require from you is your honest
cooperation to enable us see this transaction through. I guarantee that this
will be executed under legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any
breach of the law. Please get in touch with me through the above email for more
details.

Best regards.

Barrister John Okafor.

Telephone/ 234-80-330-12795
messages.raw:
[As usual, out of the blue...]

Barrister John Okafor

10 September 2006
Barrister John Okafor (SAN),
Okafor & ASSOCIATES
Telephone/ 234-80-330-12795
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am Barrister John Okafor , a solicitor atlaw,personal attorney to Mr.P.B Anderson, a national Of your country,who used to work with Shell Development Company in nigeria. Here in after shall be referred to as my client. On the 21st of April 2001, my client,his wife and their only daughter were involved in a car accident along Nouvissi express Road. Alloccupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost there lives. Since then I have made several enquiries to your embassy here to locate any of my clients extended relatives, this has also proved unsuccessful.

After these several unsuccessful attempts,I decided to track his last name over the Internet, to locate any member of his family hence I contacted you.I have contacted you to assist in repartrating the fund valued at US$10.5 million left behind by my client before it gets confisicated or declared unserviceable by the Security Finance Firm where this huge amount were deposited. The said Security Finance Company has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have his account confisicated within the next twenty one official working days.

Since I have been unsuccesfull in locating therelatives for over 2years now, I seek the consent

to present you as the next of kin to the deceased since you have the same last names, so that the proceeds of this account can be paid to you.Therefore, on receipt of your positive response, we shall then discuss the sharing ratio and modalities for transfer.I have all necessary information and legal documents needed to back you up for claim.

All I require from you is your honest cooperation to enable us see this transaction through. I guarantee that this will be executed under legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law. Please get in touch with me through the above email for more details.

Best regards.

Barrister John Okafor.
Telephone/ 234-80-330-12795

messages.body:
Mr Okafor,

Did you really mean this for me? 

I'm a bit surprised by it.

Regards,

Eliza Dane
messages.raw:
[Another Dead Bank Customer... standard format, except for the problems with the space bar - BORING... but bring it on anyway...]

Eliza Dane

Mr Okafor,

Did you really mean this for me?

I'm a bit surprised by it.

Regards,

Eliza Dane

messages.body:
11 September 2006

FROM THE DESK OF BARRISTER JOHN OKAFOR.

DATE/ 11-09-2006.

ATTN, ELIZA DANE,

AM SO DELIGHTED FOR YOUR INDICATIONS TO
ASSIST ME IN THIS TRANSACTION,I WANT YOU TO UNDERSTAND THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS
REAL AND LEGITEMATE WHICH ALL THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS CONCERNING IT WAS LEFT ON MY
DESK BY MY LATE CLIENT Mr.PETER BASIL Anderson BEFORE HIS UNTIMELY DEATH WITH
HIS FAMILIES.EVER BEFORE HIS DEATH, HE Mr.P.B. Anderson WAS A VERY CLOSE FRIEND OF MY
FAMILIES, HIS WIFE AND MY WIFE WAS SO CLOSE THAT THEY LATTER MADE MY WIFE
GENERAL SUPPERVISOR OF HIS CONSTRUCTION COMPANY.

DEAR I WANT YOU TO UNDERSTAND THAT THIS
TRANSACTION REQUIRED TRUSTH FROM THE TWO PARTIES, YOU SHOULD ABIDE WITH MY
INSTRUCTIONS IF YOU REALY WANTS US TO SHARE THIS FUND.AM GOING TO USE MY POWER
AND CONNECTIONS WITH THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS TO MAKE SURE WE CLAIM THIS FUND BUT
WHAT WORRIES ME ALOT ,IS THAT HOW AM I SURE THAT AS SOON AS THE PAYMENT IS DONE
INTO YOUR ACCOUNT ,THAT YOU WILL NOT CHEAT ON ME.

BY TOMORROW ON YOUR RESPOND TO THIS MAIL,I
WILL GO ON TO SECURE FOR YOU THE AFFIDEVITE OF CLAIM FROM FEDRAL HIGH COURT OF
JUSTICE ON YOUR BEHALF AND AFFIDEVITE OF 
CHANGE OF NAME SO THAT THE BANK WILL NOT INTORRAGATE YOU MORE ON YOUR
NAME.

YOU ARE RESTASSURED THAT WITH YOUR HONESTY,
CONFIDENCIALTY OF THIS 

TRANSACTION, NOTE THAT THIS FUND IS OURS.

BELOW IS THE TEXT OF APPLICATION OF CLAIM
WHICH IS THE FIRST STEP TO THIS 

CLAIM AND IF AFTER THE VERIFICATION OF YOUR
APPLICATION BY THE BANK AND YOU ARE CONTACTED SHOWS THAT YOU ARE SATISFIED FIT
AS THE BENEFICIARY OF THIS FUND WHICH I WILL BE WORKING ON THAT TO MAKE SURE VITAL
THINGS IS DONE BEFORE THE MANDETORY DATE GIVEN BY THE BANK WHICH IS 21 WORKING
DAY, DEAR YOU HAVE TO HASTE UP AND ALWAYS ANSWER YOUR MAILS IMMEDIATELY FROM ME
OR IF YOU ARE CONTACTED BY THE BANK PLEASE.

THANKS FOR YOUR INDICATIONS TO ASSIST ME.

BARRISTER JOHN OKAFOR.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

CAPITAL BANK PLC

International Remittance Department

35/37 Adebola Street off Ademram

Ogunsaya surulere Lagos, Nigeria

Fax 234-1-722-3364 Phone 234-2522-00-50

Email info_capitalbank_plc@myway.com 
or info_capital_bankplc1@yahoo.com

Date/11-09-2006
messages.raw:
[No problems, the hook is taken!]

Mr Okafor,

If you don't believe that you can trust me,
then why would we go ahead with this? 

I'm sending the details as you suggested,
but you should know that what you said is a bit of hit to my honour.

Regards,

Eliza Dane

messages.body:
15 September 2006

FROM THE DESK OF DR CHARLES BALOGUN

CAPITAL BANK PLC

HEAD OFFICE, 104 MARINA ROAD-LAGOS NIGERIA

FAX;234-80-245-37657

PHONE;234-805-111-5292

15/09/2006.

ATTN: MRS.ELIZABETH DANIELLE DANE,

IN ACCORDANCE TO OUR BANKING AND ALLIED
MATTERS OF 1962 AS AMENDED IN 1996, SUCH CLAIMS FROM THIS BANK ARE DETERMINABLE
WITH THIS CATEGORY Ç A È OFFICIAL QUESTIONNAIRE. YOU ARE THEREFORE ADVISED IN
YOUR OWN INTEREST TO FILL IN THE UNDERLISTED INFORMATION AS IT IS WRITTEN IN
THE DECEASED CATEGORY A FILE JACKET SUBMITTED IN OUR BANK BEFORE HIS DEATH.
NOTE THAT WE WILL NOT TOLERATE ANY DELAY, MISTAKE, ERASURE OR CANCELLATION AS
THAT MIGHT LEAD TO NOT APPROVING YOUR TENDERED APPLICATION. THE QUESTIONS ARE :

1. STATE THE NAME OF THE DECEASED ?

2. STATE HIS/HER NATIONALITY ?

3. STATE HIS/HER OCCUPATION/PROFESSION ?

4. STATE CLEARLY THE DATE THE DECEASED DIED
AND WHAT LEAD TO HIS/HER DEATH ?

5. HOW OLD WAS HE/HER WHEN HE/SHE DIED ?

6. THE DECEASED LEFT WHAT IN OUR CUSTODY ?
IF CASH STATE HOW MUCH AND WHERE IT WAS LEFT ?

7. WAS THE DECEASED MARRIED ? IF YES STATE
HIS/HER WIFES / HUSBANDS NAME AND HOW MANY CHILDREN HE/SHE HAD ?

8. WAS THE DECEASED RESIDING IN THE COUNTRY
OF ORIGIN OF FUNDS? IF YES STATE HIS/HER RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS.

9. WAS THE DECEASED A MEMBER OF ANY
REGISTERED ORGANISATION IN NIGERIA?

10. ANY OTHER VALID INFORMATION WILL BE
HELPFUL IN YOUR APPROVAL OF YOUR CLAIM.

11. A MANDATORY FEES OF $675 {SIX HUNDRED
AND SEVENTY FIVE UNITED STATES DOLLARS ) REPRESENTING OUR PROCESSING/ACTIVATING
FUND, TENDER APPLICATION FEES.

THE ABOVE FEES SHOULD BE SENT TO US VIA THE
WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER OR MONEY GRAM IN THE NAME OF OUR ACCOUNTING OFFICER: MR. KENNETH MICHAEL
OGUEJIOFOR ADDRESS: 20 SIRO OKOKO STREET OJO LAGOS NIGERIA

SEND US THE MTCN 10 DIGIT INFORMATION
CONTROL NUMBER OF THE PROCESSING FEES AS YOU SHALL SEND.

YOU ARE ADVISED TO ANSWER THE ABOVE LISTED
QUESTIONS EXACTLY AS IT IS WRITTEN IN THE DECEASED SECURTITY FILE JACKET AND
HAVE IT SENT BACK TO THIS OFFICE AT YOUR MOST POSSIBLE TIME AS OUR PROCEDURE
IMPLIES ONCE THIS IS DONE WE WILL TELL YOU WHEN THE FUND WILL BE RELEASE.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,

DR CHARLES BALOGUN

FOR CAPITAL BANK PLC NIGERIA
messages.raw:
[The bank Lad answers in full CAP LOCK mode - and waddya know, the fee is there, no messing around for this mugu. This one will be a pleasure!]

messages.body:
15 September 2006

Dear Mrs Eliza Dane,

How are you today? hope all is well.Am so
delighted for your forwarded mail from the bank for answers, dear am so happy
for your efforts towards this transaction.

I want you to be rest assured that nothing
will stop us from inheriting this fund so far you contuine abide with me and
keep it confidencial till the payment is done into your account.

Please you should not let the paying bank
to know that am the person that gave you this answers to the questions sent to
you to aviod joepodize this transaction and my office in the same bank.

Dear just copy the answers as i stated it
to you and send it to them with the application fees charged, I summited your
affidevite of surport as a back up
to your claims from high court of justice which i paid the justice that stand
for the oath $1.125 on your behalf but other legal documents is with me left by
my late client before his death.

On your response to this mail and
indication that you have sent the answers with the fees to the paying bank,
dear by monday am going to send the three legal documents concerning this
transaction such as DEPOSIT ,DEATH CERTIFICAT WITH THE POLICE REPORT.

Am wishing you best of luck and note that
you should only contact me with this box only for security reasons and sefty of
this transaction.

Best regards and below is the answers to
the bank questions.

Barrister John.

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

1. STATE THE NAME OF THE DECEASED ?
Mr.Peter.Basil Anderson

2. STATE HIS/HER NATIONALITY ? Australian 

3. STATE HIS/HER OCCUPATION/PROFESSION
?Consruction work.

4. STATE CLEARLY THE DATE THE DECEASED DIED
AND WHAT LEAD TO HIS/HER DEATH ? Car acident and 21st of April 2001

5. HOW OLD WAS HE/HER WHEN HE/SHE DIED ?
58yrs

6. THE DECEASED LEFT WHAT IN OUR CUSTODY ?
IF CASH STATE HOW MUCH AND WHERE IT WAS LEFT?Cash Dollars ,US$10.5 million,
Capital Bank Nigeria Plc.

7. WAS THE DECEASED MARRIED ? IF YES STATE
HIS/HER WIFES / HUSBANDS NAME AND HOW MANY CHILDREN HE/SHE HAD ?Yes, One
Girl,Mr Peter Basil Anderson, Mrs,Minnie Anderson, Miss Barbara Anderson.

8. WAS THE DECEASED RESIDING IN THE COUNTRY
OF ORIGIN OF FUNDS? IF YES STATE HIS/HER RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS.Yes , Close 10,
House 15 Festac Town Lagos Island Lagos Nigeria.

9. WAS THE DECEASED A MEMBER OF ANY
REGISTERED ORGANISATION IN NIGERIA? 
Yes.

10. ANY OTHER VALID INFORMATION WILL BE
HELPFUL IN YOUR APPROVAL OF YOUR CLAIM. He was a very humble man, 

Have a wonderful weekend.

Thanks

Barr,John.
messages.raw:
[The good barrister is on the ball - except for a couple of answers that don't quite make sense (as Eliza will point out).
Incidentally, Festac Town is, IIRC, Scammer Central... hell of a place for a foreign businessman to set up shop...]

Barrister John Okafor

messages.body:
Mr Okafor,

I'm grateful for your help, but by Sif the
Golden, a couple of your answers have me wondering if you're playing with a
full deck...

"9. WAS THE DECEASED A MEMBER OF ANY
REGISTERED ORGANISATION IN NIGERIA? Yes."  

Any chance of a little more info there?

"10. ANY OTHER VALID INFORMATION WILL
BE HELPFUL IN YOUR APPROVAL OF YOUR CLAIM. He was a very humble man." 

That is relevant - HOW?

Oh yeah, and I'm Ms Eliza Dane, not Mrs.

Regards,

Eliza Dane
messages.raw:
Eliza Dane

Mr Okafor,

I'm grateful for your help, but by Sif the Golden, a couple of your answers have me wondering if you're playing with a full deck...

"9. WAS THE DECEASED A MEMBER OF ANY REGISTERED ORGANISATION IN NIGERIA? Yes."

Any chance of a little more info there?

"10. ANY OTHER VALID INFORMATION WILL BE HELPFUL IN YOUR APPROVAL OF YOUR CLAIM. He was a very humble man."

That is relevant - HOW?

Oh yeah, and I'm Ms Eliza Dane, not Mrs.

Regards,

Eliza Dane

messages.body:
16 September 2006

Dear Ms

Thanks for your questions and am ready to
answer it very well for you to understand.Was the deceased a menber of any
registered orgnisaion in nigeria and the answer is yes but more,

He was a chairman of nigerian construction
union till his death he was the man that

consructed the altra market at liki island.

Why i said that hhe was  humble man was when the market was
completed ,he gave it to the local goverment of the island for free which
everybody was so happy.

Dear thi is all i cn say, you can now send
it to the bank will the fees so that by monday the paying bank will commence
on way forward.

Thanks

Barr,John.
messages.raw:
[In the Lad dictionary, it seems, humility is the equivalent of generosity. I'm glad that he cleared that up promptly! ]

messages.body:

messages.body:
Mr Balogun,

An INVOICE is a document stating what is
owed for a service and why. It has nothing to do with buying goods. 

Please send me a formal invoice right away,
listing what is being charged for what service. 

And I don't have to bear with you. I'm the
client, you bear with me!

Eliza Dane

Please i want to assured that now the bank is suspecting our moves, please kindly send the application fee to them and if you dont have the complate amount, just tell me how much you can afford by tomorrow so that i can run around and complate it for them to aviod more suspission on our side for God's sake.

I dont want to look stupid in their presence becuase i knew that what ever informations i send to them is what the bank will take becuase of too close i was with the bank and my late client.

You should once again know that if the paying bank countuine like this, i dont think we can achive our target but it will be a big blow to me if we lose this fund out of carelessness in us but you should forget about the invioce so that we can progress than going back.

I will attach the documents by tomorrow as i promissed you early but note that this documents is the final requirements from the bank .

Am looking ahead to hear from you.

Thanks,

Barr,Okafor.

messages.body:
Mr Okafor,

Have you got whipped
cream for a backbone? You are supposed to be working on my behalf, not kissing
the bank's arse!

This is a fucking farce
-we have Dr Balogun who's boasting about his affair with Peter Anderson; like I
give a shit if either of them was gay, and apparently so thick that the words
"You never sent me the invoice" don't register. 

Talk some sense into him,
willya?

Eliza Dane

messages.body:
Mr Okafor,

I NEVER GOT THE FUCKING
INVOICE!!! I'VE TOLD YOU THREE TIMES NOW, I DIDN'T GET IT! WHY THE FUCK DON'T
YOU LISTEN???

Balogun should get the
fucking sack as far as I'm concerned, and the whole fucking bank should follow
him. Of course the fucking invoice would have been sent without payment, THAT'S
WHAT A FUCKING INVOICE IS FOR! You send receipts after payment, invoices
before, WHEN WILL YOU GET THAT INTO YOUR STUPID FUCKING HEAD?

I don't care that
Balogun was Anderson's bum-boy, it's nothing to me. What's to be careful about?


I'd like to tell you to
tell them to go fuck themselves, but you're too busy kissing ass and sucking
cock to stand up to them. So just fuck off and leave me alone. 

This deal has gone all
wrong, and I don't want to get mixed with your gay-boy cabal.

Eliza Dane
